short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension keeps your tabs ordered by last used

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the new version It also deletes old tabs passing a user defined threshold. Just define it in the popup, how many tabs you want to keep on your window and if you want to disable this feature at all.

This extension helps keeping your tabs in usage order by setting to the first element the mos recent active tab.

See it on github! https://github.com/ZeroDragon/bubble-tabs
